name: Three Bots
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2015

Free for an unlimited time!

Control three robots carefully to eliminate invaders as many as you can, avoiding friendly fire.

- One spinner to control three characters, hard to get started, harder to master.

- PRO option, harder than harder, with exclusive PRO leaderboard.

- Retro style pixel-art, with awesome 8-bit music.

- Three Nos: No Ads, No In-App-Purchases, No Rate-Asking-Pop-Ups. (Please, remember to rate manually if you like this game.)

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/threebots

Hope you will LIKE it!
